{"id":932386415,"question_id":2695,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681288896,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"276 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/932386415/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Score of an Array After Marking All Elements","memory":"78.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long findScore(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        TreeMap<Integer, List<Integer>> map = new TreeMap<>();\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.length; i++){\n            int n = nums[i];\n            map.putIfAbsent(n, new ArrayList<>());\n            map.get(n).add(i);\n        }\n        \n        boolean[] bool = new boolean[len];\n        \n        long cnt = 0;\n        for(Map.Entry<Integer, List<Integer>> en : map.entrySet()){\n            \n            int n = en.getKey();\n            List<Integer> list = en.getValue();\n            \n            for(int i : list){\n                \n                if(bool[i]==false){\n                    bool[i]=true;\n                    if(i-1>=0)  bool[i-1]=true;\n                    if(i+1<len) bool[i+1]= true;\n                     cnt += n;\n                }\n                \n               \n            }\n        }\n        \n        return cnt;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-score-of-an-array-after-marking-all-elements","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
